azurerm_site_recovery_fabric.description: Manages a Site Recovery Replication Fabric on Azure.

name.description: The name of the network mapping.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group where the vault that should be updated is located.

recovery_vault_name.description: The name of the vault that should be updated.

location.description: In what region should the fabric be located.

id.description: The ID of the Site Recovery Fabric.

create.description: Used when creating the Site Recovery Fabric.

update.description: Used when updating the Site Recovery Fabric.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Site Recovery Fabric.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Site Recovery Fabric.
